items.sentence: Tom had never realized just how beautiful Mary really was.
If the world was going to end tomorrow, what would you do?
Tom saw that Mary was crying and went over to comfort her.
I think that we\'re getting close to solving this mystery.
I was relieved to hear that Tom wasn\'t seriously injured.
Tom sent Mary a picture of the view from his hotel window.
Chuck\'s Diner is where Tom and Mary first met each other.
What would you do if the world were going to end tomorrow?
Didn\'t you know that Tom was planning to go to Australia?
I want Tom to know that I didn\'t mean for this to happen.
I had a pretty good idea Tom wouldn\'t like my suggestion.
Do you actually think I\'m going to go to Boston with Tom?
Do you have any idea where Tom could\'ve hidden the money?
Tom made sure his children ate everything on their plates.
I\'m going to leave one day earlier than I had planned to.
You should tell Tom that you don\'t want to do that again.
When was the last time you looked at yourself in a mirror?
Tom pried up some floorboards, looking for the gold coins.
What I really want to hear about is Tom\'s new girlfriend.
Tom didn\'t know he was going to die before he was thirty.
